uatWorkflows.title: Add a Task
uatWorkflows.goal: Ensure the user can add a new task with a priority.
steps: Type a task description in the input.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: The task appears in the list with the correct text and priority label.

uatWorkflows.title: Mark a Task as Complete
uatWorkflows.goal: Verify that tasks can be marked done.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: The task text has a line-through and the color fades to indicate completion.

uatWorkflows.title: Edit a Task
uatWorkflows.goal: Allow users to change the task text.
steps: Modify the text in the input.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: The updated task text is reflected in the list.

uatWorkflows.title: Filter Tasks
uatWorkflows.goal: View tasks based on their status.

uatWorkflows.title: Clear Completed
uatWorkflows.goal: Remove all completed tasks in one action.

uatWorkflows.title: Add Long Task Descriptions
steps: Add a task with a very long description.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: Text wraps cleanly, layout does not break.

uatWorkflows.title: Add Tasks with Identical Text
uatWorkflows.goal: Ensure app accepts tasks with duplicate text but unique IDs.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: Both appear in the list with different timestamps.

uatWorkflows.title: Switch Priorities Frequently
steps: Switch priorities back and forth before adding the task.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: Task uses the most recent selection.

uatWorkflows.title: Edit and Save Empty Task
uatWorkflows.goal: Prevent saving an empty task description.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: App should disallow or revert the change.

uatWorkflows.title: Test Responsiveness
uatWorkflows.goal: Verify layout responsiveness at different screen sizes.
steps: Resize the browser or use dev tools to simulate tablet and mobile viewports.
uatWorkflows.expectedResult: Layout adjusts properly with no overlaps or cut-off elements.

uatWorkflows.title: Bulk Task Completion
uatWorkflows.goal: Ensure performance when toggling many tasks.
steps: Add 5+ tasks and mark them all as done.
